title: UseArtifactsOutput and ArtifactsPath properties are missing from autocomplete list
body:
_This issue has been moved from [a ticket on Developer Community](https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/t/UseArtifactsOutput-and-ArtifactsPath-pro/10544436)._

---
When editing a `Directory.Build.props` file, the `UseArtifactsOutput` and `ArtifactsPath` properties (https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/sdk/artifacts-output) are missing from autocomplete list, making it harder to discover that new feature and use it.

---
